alert.note: Alert for Eastern Essex; Western Essex (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 04 at 3:42PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Essex County through 415 PM EDT... At 342 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Elizabethtown, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Elizabethtown, Lewis, Mineville, Witherbee, and New Russia. This includes Interstate 87 between mile markers 105 and 116. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
